verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
How <S%H5704>long<s%> will ye <S%H7760>hunt<s%> <S%H7078>for<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%>? <S%H995>Consider<s%>, and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> we will <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
Wherefore are we <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H929>beasts<s%>, And are become <S%H2933>unclean<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>?

Thou that <S%H2963>tearest<s%> <S%H5315>thyself<s%> in thine <S%H639>anger<s%>, Shall the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> for <S%H6697>thee<s%>? Or shall the rock be <S%H6275>removed<s%> out of its <S%H4725>place<s%>?
Yea <S%H216><s%>, the light of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%>, And the <S%H7632>spark<s%> of his <S%H784>fire<s%> shall not <S%H5050>shine<s%>.
The <S%H216>light<s%> shall be <S%H2821>dark<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%>, And his <S%H5216>lamp<s%> above him shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%>.
The <S%H6806>steps<s%> of his <S%H202>strength<s%> shall be <S%H3334>straitened<s%>, And his own <S%H6098>counsel<s%> shall cast him <S%H7993>down<s%>.
For he is <S%H7971>cast<s%> into a <S%H7568>net<s%> by his own <S%H7272>feet<s%>, And he <S%H1980>walketh<s%> upon the <S%H7639>toils<s%>.
A <S%H6341>gin<s%> shall <S%H270>take<s%> him by the <S%H6119>heel<s%>, And a <S%H6782>snare<s%> shall lay hold on <S%H2388>him<s%>.
A <S%H2256>noose<s%> is <S%H2934>hid<s%> for him in the <S%H776>ground<s%>, And a <S%H4434>trap<s%> for him in the <S%H5410>way<s%>.
Terrors <S%H1091><s%> shall make him <S%H1204>afraid<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, And shall <S%H6327>chase<s%> him at his <S%H7272>heels<s%>.
His <S%H202>strength<s%> shall be <S%H7457>hunger-bitten<s%>, And <S%H343>calamity<s%> shall be <S%H3559>ready<s%> at his <S%H6763>side<s%>.
The <S%H905>members<s%> of his <S%H5785>body<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%>, <S%H1060>Yea<s%>, the first-born of <S%H4194>death<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> his <S%H905>members<s%>.
He shall be rooted <S%H5423>out<s%> of his <S%H168>tent<s%> where he <S%H4009>trusteth<s%>; And he shall be <S%H6805>brought<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1091>terrors<s%>.
There shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%> that which is <S%H1097>none<s%> of <S%H1614>his<s%>: Brimstone shall be <S%H2219>scattered<s%> upon his <S%H5116>habitation<s%>.
His <S%H8328>roots<s%> shall be dried <S%H3001>up<s%> <S%H4605>beneath<s%>, And above shall his <S%H7105>branch<s%> be cut <S%H5243>off<s%>.
His <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H776>earth<s%>, And he shall have no <S%H8034>name<s%> in the <S%H6440>street<s%>.
He shall be <S%H1920>driven<s%> from <S%H216>light<s%> into <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, And <S%H5074>chased<s%> out of the <S%H8398>world<s%>.
He shall have neither <S%H5209>son<s%> nor <S%H5220>son<s%>'s son among his <S%H5971>people<s%>, Nor any <S%H8300>remaining<s%> where he <S%H4033>sojourned<s%>.
They that come <S%H314>after<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at his <S%H3117>day<s%>, As they that went <S%H6931>before<s%> were <S%H270>affrighted<s%>.
Surely such are the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of the <S%H5767>unrighteous<s%>, And this is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of him that <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> not <S%H410>God<s%>.
